description: Complete CSS design token definitions for Pomo-Flow

priority_colors.description: Colors used for task priority indicators

--color-priority-high.description: High priority - red for urgent tasks

--color-priority-medium.description: Medium priority - orange/amber for default tasks

--color-priority-low.description: Low priority - blue for optional tasks

--color-work.description: Work color - green for active work state

priority_backgrounds.description: Background colors with transparency for priority indicators

priority_glows.description: Glow effects for emphasis and visual feedback

--priority-high-glow.description: High priority glow effect with dual shadows

--priority-medium-glow.description: Medium priority glow effect with dual shadows

--priority-low-glow.description: Low priority glow effect with dual shadows

alpha_variants.description: Alpha variants for different opacity levels

consistency_rules: All medium priority indicators must use --color-priority-medium
All glow effects must use corresponding --priority-*-glow token
No hardcoded hex values allowed for priority colors
Gradients must not end in different hex values than they start with
Alpha values must use appropriate CSS variables
forbidden_patterns: linear-gradient ending in different color than starting color
rgba(245, 158, 11, X) with X not in predefined alpha variants
hardcoded shadow effects using rgba values

color_consistency.description: All medium priority colors must be identical
test_cases: Board view medium priority badges match canvas view
Calendar view medium priority indicators match table view
Mobile app medium priority colors match web app
All hover states use consistent colors

token_usage.description: All colors must use CSS design tokens
test_cases: No hardcoded hex values in priority colors
All rgba values use appropriate CSS variables
All gradients use CSS tokens not hex values
All shadows use CSS glow variables

opacity_consistency.description: Alpha levels must be consistent across contexts
test_cases: Background opacity levels follow predefined values
Border opacity levels use appropriate tokens
Hover states use consistent alpha values

rollback_procedure.validation: Run consistency validation after each phase
rollback_procedure.testing: Visual testing across all views required

manual_checks: Visual testing in all views (Board, Calendar, Canvas, Table)
